body:
Three packages are created in this pull request, all part of the [openCARP](https://opencarp.org) ecosystem.

- opencarp
- py-carputils
- meshtool

The openCARP simulation software is an open cardiac electrophysiology simulator for in-silico experiments.
Meshtool is a utility for mesh manipulation.
carputils is a Python framework to encode in silico experiments including pre- and postprocessing and run them with the openCARP simulator.
title: New packages for openCARP
